mapper.select: select tb_shop.shop_name, tb_shop.shop_tell, tb_reservation.reser_idx, tb_reservation.reser_date , tb_reservation.reser_party, tb_reservation.reser_comment,tb_reservation.reser_state from tb_shop left outer join tb_reservation using(shop_idx) where tb_shop.member_id = #{memberId}

select tb_shop.shop_name, tb_shop.shop_tell, tb_waiting.wait_reg_date, tb_waiting.wait_idx,tb_waiting.wait_state,tb_waiting.wait_party from tb_shop left outer join tb_waiting using(shop_idx) where tb_shop.member_id = #{memberId}
